info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 25 at 3:22PM PDT until August 25 at 7:30PM PDT by NWS Elko NV
info.description:
* WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of northeast Nevada, including the following county, Elko.
* WHEN...Until 730 PM PDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 322 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Between 0.2 and 0.4 inches of rain have fallen. - The Adobe Fire Burn Scar is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.1 to 0.2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... The Adobe Fire Burn Scar Mainly rural areas of Central Elko County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM PDT THIS EVENING
